reqs:
The instructor for this seminar is Dr. Nicholas May, nicholas.may@ubc.ca
Indigenous Encounters with Christianity: This seminar investigates the diverse forms of religious interaction and change experienced by Indigenous peoples in North America and beyond following their encounters with various Christianities.
courseName: Topics in Comparative Indigenous History - COMP INDIG HIST
description: Comparative interdisciplinary analysis of selected topics in Indigenous history in North America and beyong. HIST 302 or other background in the field is recommended.
